meanings.sent1: She is very opinionative about politics.
meanings.sent2: He is known for his opinionative nature in debates.
meanings.sent3: Her opinionative remarks always spark lively discussions.
meanings.sent4: His opinionative stance on the matter was like a bold flag in the wind.

meanings.definition: Inclined to give opinions without being asked
meanings.sent1: The opinionative neighbor always shares his thoughts on our garden.
meanings.sent2: She can be quite opinionative, even in casual conversations.
meanings.sent3: The opinionative cat seemed to have an opinion on everything.
meanings.sent4: His opinionative behavior was like a leaky faucet, constantly dripping thoughts.
meanings.sent5: The opinionative student never missed a chance to voice his views.
